name: Cowbar
description:
If you like drinking and fighting, but you don't want to harm your body or your liver, this game is for you.

Move with WASD
Attack with left and right mouse buttons
Look with mouse
Drink beers to regain health

Warning: alcohol effetcts could cause motion sickness. If that is the case, you can disable the double vision effect from the settings.

Please remember to always drink responsibly :)

Full source code and assets available here: https://github.com/StefanoGalligani/DrunkGame

Sound Effect from Pixabay
Textures by Pexels: https://www.pexels.com/
